mapper.select: SELECT employee_id AS employeeId, dept_id AS deptId, work_date AS workDate, check_in_time AS checkInTime, check_out_time AS checkOutTime, attendance_id AS attendanceId FROM attendance ORDER BY work_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vacation (employee_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{leaveType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
